Anup.text: Thanks Dude. Let's plan and catch up at your palce some time.

Rahul.text: Hey buddy..we are planning for Leh-Ladakh trip. Will you join?
Hey Rahul. Will surely join. Let's discuss the plan
Ya Sure. We will meet some where and make the plan.

Dipak.text: Hi Nikhil..I am coming to Pune this saturday for my friends wedding
That's great. If you are free from the weddings let us meet
Ya Sure. I will let you know..
